laboratory_examinations.findings: Patient 1: Baseline GH concentration 39.1 ng/ml, >50 ng/ml after stimulation. Patient 2: Basal GH level 58 ng/ml.
Patient 1: Serum IGF-I 20 ng/ml, -5.0 SDS; Patient 2: Serum IGF-I 20 ng/ml, -2.6 SDS.
Patient 1: IGFBP-3 1720 ng/ml, -2.6 SDS; Patient 2: IGFBP-3 1540 ng/ml, -2.0 SDS.
Patient 1: GHBP 383 pmol/liter (normal range 431-1892); Patient 2: GHBP 208 pmol/liter (normal range 431-1892).
Patient 1 height 90.3 cm, -4.8 SDS; After IGF-I therapy height velocity increased from -3.0 SDS to -1.1 SDS (first year), -1.4 SDS (second year), and -0.2 SDS (third year).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Height increased from -4.9 SDS to -3.8 SDS.

laboratory_examinations.date: Before and After 3 years of IGF-I therapy
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: BMI increased from 13.9 kg/m² to 14.7 kg/m².
